definition: refers to Dr Sun Yat-sen/Zhongshan, prefecture-level city in Guangdong, close to Sun Yat-sen's birthplace/Nakayama (Japanese surname)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Guomintang 國民黨|国民党/same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
Zhongshan prefecture-level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China, close to Dr Sun Yat-sen's birthplace
Dr Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum in Nanjing
Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
Chinese tunic suit

Zhongshan or Chungshan district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Zhongshan district of Dalian 大連市|大连市[Da4 lian2 shi4], Liaoning/Chungshan district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
NAKAYAMA Nariaki (1943-), right-wing Japanese cabinet minister and prominent denier of Japanese war crimes
Chinese tunic suit/Mao jacket/CL:件[jian4]
The Wolf of Zhongshan, fable by Ma Zhongxi 馬中錫|马中锡[Ma3 Zhong1 xi1]

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: Take a walk through the park on Zhongshan Road.
Japanese Army 16th Division Infantry troops climb up the walls near Zhongshan Gate.
sentences.chinese: 日军第十六师团步兵攀上中山门。

sentences.english: The Sun Yat-Sen Mausoleum is like a huge green leaf that warms and comforts the heart of every people in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 中山陵象一片巨大的绿叶，温润着每个南京人的心灵。

sentences.english: B: Oh, yes, thanks. I'm looking for Zhong Shan Road.
sentences.chinese: 哦，是的，谢谢，我在找中山路。

sentences.english: The hoolock gibbon mainly distributes in the mid-mountain humid evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 它们主要分布在中山湿性常绿阔叶林。

sentences.english: The traffic on the South Zhongshan Road near the Zhonghua Gate is jammed.
sentences.chinese: 中山南路中华门段上有交通堵塞。

sentences.english: The paper presents a set of observations on political theology of Sun Yat-sen's thought.
sentences.chinese: 本文是对孙中山思想中的政治神学所做的一些观察。

sentences.english: Do you want Chungshan 4th Street or 3rd Street?
sentences.chinese: 您要去中山四街还是三街呢？

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 开始悄悄作画，去中山公园写生，作花鸟册页等。

sentences.english: Perfection Lighting Co. , Ltd. is a vigorous and innovative enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 中山完美灯饰厂是一个充满朝气和创新的企业。

sentences.english: In 1906 he met Mr. Sun Yat-sen in Japan and joined the Chinese Revolutionary League.
sentences.chinese: 1906年他在日本得会孙中山，并加入同盟会。

sentences.english: My name is Lin Lixia and I am presently studying as a senior at Zhongshan University.
sentences.chinese: 我叫林丽霞，目前是中山大学四年级的学生。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat- sen came Chiang Kai- shek, who brought the Kuomintang' s military power to its zenith.
sentences.chinese: 蒋介石代替孙中山，创造了国民党的全盛的军事时代。

sentences.english: He was buried on a hillside outside Nanjing, not far from Sun Yat-sen’s mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 他被埋葬在南京郊外的一个小山丘边，离中山陵不远。

sentences.english: Uchiyama said other countries may be in a similar situation.
sentences.chinese: 中山教授说，其他国家可能也存在类似的问题。
